definitions.definition: to operate; to maneuver; to manipulate (with the hands)

parsedExamples.example: 操作規程 / 操作规程  ―  cāozuò guīchéng  ―  operating specifications
微機操作 / 微机操作  ―  wēijī cāozuò  ―  computer operation
